name: Neo-CLI
desc: bash script for my day-to-day tasks

name: Nlp to Sql
desc: This was developed for the submission of codeShastra ( round 0), in a group of 4. Aim was to translate user queries in plain english to valid sql commands.
result: We made a nodejs rest server for translation. Using naive bayes classifier on the token we were are able translate simple queries like select, update, delete, etc. Qualified for the next round ;)

name: Arogya
desc: Our team submission for SIH grand finale 2020. Aim was to make a Health monitoring at low bandwidth, so that remote patients would be kept in check virtually.
result: App supports fetching of patients parameters like heartbeats, temperatures, etc collected through sensors (Raspberry Pi) and transferred over udp (webrtc) so that bandwith consumed is less. Also patients live feed can be send to app.

name: canteen-android-app
desc: Order from the canteen on your phone! This was a my project as a mentee in Unicode (a open-source club in DJSCE)

name: Notes
desc: light-weight android application for saving text notes offline

name: notes-rest
desc: A nodejs REST api for note management system. Perform CRUD for notes !

name: QuotesWall
desc: Andriod app for setting wallpapers of random images with random quotes overlaid on them.

name: Music-player
desc: Music player for android. scans and plays all the offline available song, supports background play

name: StaffApp
desc: Submission for tsec hackathon. We made a staff appriciation app that gamifies the formal workspace with leaderboards, etc.

name: DS Miniproject
desc: Miniproject for data structures course in the curriculum. A command-line based ordering system :p

name: oopm miniproject
desc: Miniproject for OOPM (java) course in the curriculum. Made a 'book-sharing' desktop application with javax (GUI) and sql

name: Popular Movies App
desc: popular movies android app with TMDB api

name: react-native-beginner
desc: A pomodoro timer, a calculator and a random quote generator in one app.
